title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing the CLI and Go-based server to download, build, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python applications with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter for Ollama models, allowing use of LangChain abstractions with local Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source web UI for Ollama featuring chat, model management, and role-based access control.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama that wraps the REST API, allowing Java/Kotlin/Scala applications to run local LLMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Example repository demonstrating retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm charts to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Utility library exposing Ollama embedding models via a REST endpoint compatible with OpenAI format.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that provides a chat interface for Ollama models with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-use Docker images for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants plus docker-compose stacks.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API enabling native Nim applications to run local LLMs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Tokio async runtime.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting both synchronous and async patterns for local LLM inference.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI chat client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation persistence.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers with slash commands and per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-mlflow
summary: MLflow deployment plugin that serves Ollama models behind a REST gateway with logging and A/B testing.
